title: Chiptunes: 8-bit Gamer
description: A music pack that is inspiered by chip music from the 8-bit era. This nostalgic retro sounding music pack is mainly intended for your 2D platformer game.
longDescription:
'Chiptunes: 8-bit Gamer' is a music pack, that is inspiered by chip music from the 8-bit era. This nostalgic retro sounding music pack is mainly intended for your 2D platformer game.


The music pack contains 11 chiptunes, that are professionally mixed and mastered - Ready to be used in your project! Every track is looped once, to demonstrate how it actually sounds being looped - And every track is looping seamlessly without any cracking sound defects. 



Listen to the full tracks HERE (Soundcloud link)


TRACKLIST:

01 - Treasure Hunt [01:40]

02 - Two-Player Adventure [02:44]

03 - A Bumpy 2D Ride [01:26]

04 - Laser Dragon [02:13]

05 - Insert Coin to Play [02:13]

06 - Happy Pirates [01:40]

07 - 2D Platform Love [02:08]

08 - Mega Runner [02:21]

09 - The Final Battle [02:08]

10 - You Win [01:40]

11 - The Game is Over [02:34]



About me:

I have been making music since 1999 and since then I've been studied a wide range of music related topics, such as audio engineering, orchestral music theory and songwriting. I love music education and I have over 10 certificates with more specific music subjects as well. I am also a gamer myself and I love playing video games. I would love to see what you create with my music and I will support your game if you just notify me. 


Support:

hello@pierreberggren.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  11 seamlessly looping tracks
  •  Chip music with professional audio quality


Number of Audio Wavs: 11

Number of Audio Cues: 11

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 24-bit WAV

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 22 min 47 sec

Supported Development Platforms: All platforms
